messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level B1

Text saved: Asteroids, which are large rocks that travel through space, are called 'Potentially Hazardous' when they pass within 7.5 million kilometres of Earth. NASA has made a map of 1,400 of these asteroids, but they do not expect any of them to be a danger in the next one hundred years. With the technology that is available now, NASA can follow these objects and predict a possible impact. If this happens, two different solutions could be used to protect our planet.

metadata.feedback_text: The submission is an instant FAIL. The primary reason is a violation of the CEFR Compliance Check in Stage 1. The target CEFR level was B1, but the submitted text was classified as B2 by the metrics.

messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level B1

Text saved: Asteroids are large rocks that travel through space, and they are called 'Hazardous' when they pass within 7.5 million kilometres of Earth. NASA has made a map of 1,400 of these asteroids, but they do not expect any of them to be a danger in the next one hundred years. With the technology that is available now, NASA can follow these objects and predict a possible impact. If this happens, two different solutions could be used to protect our planet.
